projectGridLines.title: Real-World Data Problems
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

To design, develop, and execute high-impact analytics solutions for large, complex, structured,

and unstructured datasets (including big data) to help clients make better fact-based decisions.

Employ research on evolving datasets and advanced analytical techniques for impactful client

deliverables.


ZSâ€™s Advanced Data Science group works with various industries such as Healthcare and Bio-

Tech, Hi-Tech & Telecommunication, Financial Services, and Travel. The projects include


datasets that are structured, unstructured (for example, text, voice, image, etc.), and semi-

structured (for example, patient-level records) data. At ZS, we encourage advanced analytical


techniques, innovative machine learning models, artificial intelligence solutions, advanced

statistics and optimization approaches.

Skill sets:

o Strong academic performance with a good CGPA

o Knowledge in generative AI, deep learning, statistical techniques, and engineering

integration for scalable solutions.

o Knowledge of programming (e.g. Java/Python/R);

o Knowledge of big data/advanced analytics concepts and algorithms (e.g. text mining,

social listening, recommender systems, predictive modelling, etc.

Traits expectation:

o Excellent oral and written communication skills.

o Strong attention to detail, with a research-focused mindset;

o Excellent critical thinking and problem-solving skills;

o High motivation, good work ethic and maturity.
